style.css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://book.zongheng.com/"),url-prefix("http://static.zongheng.com/"){
div#sidekf,
div.zhda.read_last_middle,
div#chapterContent > div,
div.tc.quickoprate,
div.tc.lan,
div.readset,
div.guide_nav,
button.setreset.default_user_setting,
div#contextMenu,
div.logonbox,
a.adClickCss, 
div#ui_chapter_comment_panel,
div.foot,
div.author_qt, /*qt链接*/
div#zh_ab_rb, /*章节右侧广告*/
[class^="zhtlnk_"],
div#uiShortcutButton :not(:first-child):not(:last-child), /*导航栏 去头掐尾*/
div#dynamicUp, /*热门游戏*/
div#dynamicDonate, /*求捧场*/
div.adClickCss,
div.partner.box.seo,
div.pray_pc.box,
object.adClickCss /*正文上方广告*/
{
  display:none !important;
}
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://zongheng.com/") {
div#sidekf /*在线客服*/
{
  display:none !important;
}
}
